Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition -- 1 Mill Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. Landry, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $671,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of operating and maintaining a jail facility in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Bayou Plaquemine Gravity Drainage Dist. No. 12 -- 20 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Bayou Plaquemine Gravity Drainage District No. 12 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Bayou Plaquemine Gravity Drainage District No. 12 of St. Landry Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), renew the levy of a consolidated special tax of twenty (20) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, having an estimated annual collection of $200,000 for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for said District?
